titles.title: Food Date Labeling Act of 2019
Food Date Labeling Act of 2019
A bill to establish requirements for quality and discard dates that are, at the option of food labelers, included in food packaging, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary:
Food Date Labeling Act of 2019
This bill addresses food waste by establishing requirements to standardize the quality date and discard date labels on food packaging.
